repository.name: spm-mcp
repository.description: Swift Package Manager MCP Server written in Swift

readme:
# SPM-MCP

A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides automation capabilities using Swift Package Manager (SPM).

## Config

### Mise

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "spm": {
      "command": "mise",
      "args": ["x", "ubi:simpleswift/spm-mcp@latest", "--", "spm-mcp"]
    }
  }
}
```

## Development

### Swift Package Manager

```bash
swift package resolve
swift build
swift run
```

### Generate `.xcworkspace`

1. Install Tuist

```bash
mise install tuist 
```

2. Generate the workspace

```bash
tuist generate
```
